title: Add Tuenti to people Hub
body: Tuenti is a social network as Facebook (in Spanish or English or Catalan), it would be very useful for spanish people or south americans or people who have signed up on it, to have it (integrated) into the people hub. I have a lot spanish friends who have hesitated to buy a Windows phone (and finally didn't buy it) because their favourite social network wasn't neither on the marketplace, neither on the people hub
